title: Slow cooker beef silverside
ingredients: ['1 knob butter', '900g beef silverside, thickly sliced', '4 to 5 large potatoes, thickly sliced', '5 carrots, cut on the diagonal', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 litre beef stock', '250ml red wine', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', 'dried herbs to taste']
